channel.title: CVE Feed for ome -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ome -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-41132|2024-08-04T02:59:31.416Z -- ome -- omero-web
item.description: OMERO.web provides a web based client and plugin infrastructure. In versions prior to 5.11.0, a variety of templates do not perform proper sanitization through HTML escaping. Due to the lack of sanitization and use of ``jQuery.html()``, there are a whole host of cross-site scripting possibilities with specially crafted input to a variety of fields. This issue is patched in version 5.11.0. There are no known workarounds aside from upgrading.

item.title: CVE-2024-35180|2024-08-02T03:07:46.755Z -- ome -- omero-web
item.description: OMERO.web provides a web based client and plugin infrastructure. There is currently no escaping or validation of the `callback` parameter that can be passed to various OMERO.web endpoints that have JSONP enabled. This vulnerability has been patched in version 5.26.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-35180|2024-06-04T17:34:51.270Z -- ome -- omero-web
item.description: OMERO.web provides a web based client and plugin infrastructure. There is currently no escaping or validation of the `callback` parameter that can be passed to various OMERO.web endpoints that have JSONP enabled. This vulnerability has been patched in version 5.26.0.
